text:
Divtrip bero,
tumhare naam kaafi hai, but hum divtrip  ke naam se hi pechante, yahan tak ki mein search bhi divtrip kiya tha ispar aur laga tha ki tumne shayad account nhi banaya XD
Kahan se shuru karu, pehli mulakat hui thi as priank ka chaapu wingie. Mai galat tha, tum chappu hi nhi backchod bhi ho.
Alag hi pyaari si vibe hai tumhari, Punjabi mix Kanpuriya XD
One of the most helping and confident banda i know.
Honestly, agar tum nhi hote toh mera placement na hota, kaafi help kaari hai tumne uss samay mein.
Also, you have one of the best voices i know. Abhi tak yaad hai, last sem tha, chandini raat mein bina light ke chandinini baar mein bethe the, gaane chal rhe the, aur pata nhi kab tumne beech mein saath gana shuru kar diya tha. last mein literal chills aaye the.
Pictionary ke master, also thanks for explaining vipul's jokes when i was sober :P
Bhai apne dost ko thank you bol dena, kaafi mehnat kari thi usne. XD
Ab aage i seriously hope tum banglore aao, kyunki chennai doesn't deserve you
Mein toh milne aata rahunga, tumhari surili awaaz aage bhi sunni hai. :p
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
Yaar, you have been the closest to me since I can remember. Tere liye jitne words likhu kam hai, milte hi vibe match hogyi thi, had no idea college mein bhi close rhenge. Wish this goes on for the entire life.
Kahan kahan backchodi nhi machayi apan ne XD,
Tere impormtu raps, Gyaan sessions, Civil ki classes, Last moment par Assignments aur lab reports submit karna, jammin on edm aur backchod kahaniyan yaad rhegi. 
Tu hi tha jisne bataya blackout hona can be this fun XD
Photos kam hai apni, Kota mein machane ke liye bhi samay nikalna hoga, Zameen bhi khareed lenge XD.
Congratulations on IIMA. Aage bhi aise hi machate rehna.
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
Sesti John Mary aka Gaurav bhai,
Agar koi pooche ki vibe match kya hota hai, toh tera hi example dunga,
Tumhare saath saare dukhe dhuein mein udd jate the
Antaragni mein saath udne se lekar, sober Chatti manzil ki chhat par sunrise par ustad ji gaanon par vibe karne ke saathi ho tum, tumhe koi nhi bhula sakta, itne acche dil aadmi ho tum
Tere trip ki photos dekhkar alag jali hui hai meri, bas kab yeh lockdown khatam ho, aur kab tere saath kasol basne ke liye chale.
Last mein jaate jaate itna pyara farewell diya ki kabhi nhi bhula paunga, Bhajan par vibe karte hue oregano aur cheese waali maagi with coffee, pure backchod bhai <3
Tumne ek cheez sikhayi thi jo humesha yaad rhegi: "Extra kuch nhi hota"
Ab toh tum bas bagal mein aagye ho, saath chalta rhega yeh caravan...
PS: Tera "mic" drop humesha yaad rahega. XD
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
Freshers drams practice se late night food cravings trips to offline, a best friend who was always there for me
Comrade in AUV
Always joyfull, thodi si fraudy and a whole lot of fun
Never change the beautiful person you are.
Lagta hai matching printed tshirts sapna hi reh jayega
Be prepared for the trio trips in Bangalore XD
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
Osama Bhai,
The OG of Reels and Bollywood
The guy with the best fashion sense,
Orientation mein hi pata chalgya tha ki backchod hai tu
First year mein saath mein TA draw karne se lekar, last year mein saath crush karne tak ka safar bohot pyara raha hai.
Tere bina Goa ki vibe hi nhi thi
Ek time tha jab tumhe osama nhi ShowM bulate the, Techkriti mein tu saath tha isiliye reh liya itne mahine,
Tere saath jo train miss hui thi uska gam nhi mujhe, ussi bahane tune shopping karwa di :P
Teri vidaai do baar dekhi hai mene, lekin abhi toh vapas aur milna hai.
Bangalore mein bhi saath machana hai.
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
NIlay bhaiiiiiii, First year se laga tha stud launda hai, couldnt have been more correct.XD
A real cool OG jo bagal mein rehta tha
Batti ka chappu banda, studious tha par bakchodi mein kabhi kami nhi chodi
Har shaam 5 bje saath canteen chalne wala, mess mein saath mein quad mein bethkar khane wala
Saath mein drink nights, movie nights se lekar, fests/Diwali mein bakchodi tak, saath mein kurte khareedne tak, you were one of the core people who made a big influence on me
Wing bulla sessions, AUV mein R6 are precious memories we have together
You made goa and chennai adventurous and fun bro ( sorry tera chapora fort reh gya lol)
Teri last ki bday party dhundhli si yaad hai :p cuz i was intoxicated on so much fun XD
Jab bhi mein "ae, chal na", "dude", "broooo", "cooool", "aWESOMe" jaise phrase padhunga toh teri hi voice mein padhunga
haste rehna bhai, teri smile kaafi contagious hai.
Aise hi cool rehna, kabhi shave mat karna XD
Tu last time nhi aya paya is ka bohot dukh hai, cover up karne ke liye dubara milenge jaldi
PS: Library ki book return karde, dhool kha rhi. LOL
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
'Machli', 'Pendulum', 'PP', pata nhi kitne naam hai tere lol.
Kya hi likhu tere baare mein, tujhe toh sab kuch hi pta hai XD
Now that i think about it, kuch jyada hi pata hai tujhe :o 
I cant pinpoint ki kab pehli baar mile the, though ik AUV was the initiator, i guess AUV ki apni pehli treat party @Liquid? pehle din milte hi tumne GPL leli thi. AUV ki wajah se kaafi GPL hui hai meri, creativity at its max...
Vahan se toh kya highs ka safar chalu hua ki kabhi low aya hi nhi  XD, aage bhi na aaye i hope
AUV mein bethakr saath mein bakchodi karna, poster design, video creation, free pool time with a goPro XD
Lol video se yaad aya 6 mahine ki mehnat waali 6 sec waali, kya thi woh lol.
Fir team video, which turned out decent tho, backchod timelapse, epic music, and a whole lot of bloopers.
NIOT chennai mein bakchodi, AUV room mein dimensional theories frame karna.....Paper likh de kya uspar? XD
Wahan se late night getaways with gupta, inshu, movies, mcd, pizza hut, z square shopping...... kaafi memories.
Antaragini aur Techkriti mein sath bakchodi karna se fluids ke liye saath mein padhna
Kabh saath mein padhai ho hi nhi paati thi XD
Library mein apan toh keval bakchodi karne ke liye hi aath bethe hai
One of the best trips with you and vidit, ekdum unplanned, but turned out to be epic, full of adventures, bhoot se bhagna, truck se lift, oyo wale se ladayi karna, dangerous paragliding, freezingly cold kullu mein butter bun, and finally the life threatening trek ( sach mein zindagi bachayi hai tune XD). Couldnt have been better.
Wahan se escalate hua aur fir neeche aya hi nhi, tumhari baap treat, elections ki politics, late nights on OAT rooftop( kon the woh do bacche jo poori kahani sun liye the? XD), mama mio coffee trips
Worst deal I made: TeRi CanTEEn, mEri CaNTeeN and vice versa. XD
Hall 12 ka canteen wala mujhe dekhkar there room number par likhta tha XD
Last sem mein toh A6 mein hi bas gya tha mein,
kaafi selfless hai tu ( tujhe pata nhi hai pr tu hai)
one who gets all my jokes, better photographer than most and my pseudo roommate XD
Flat dekhlo Banglore ke liye, apne ko toh aur machana hai abhi <3
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
Muttal Bhai
Real OG jisne EDM sunaya, garrix lekar gya, resume sahi karwaya, intern lagwai, Mera Bhai
tune toh sab dekha hai XD
Tumhare RR ka toh video collection hai,
Abhi tak yaad hai first yer mein tu antrangni voluteer ki tarah kaafi kaam kiya tha, influence hokar mene bhi kisi kaam ke liye haan bol di thi and the next thing i know, i am @lucknow airport waiting for some judges jinke naam bhi nhi pata the XD
Tumhare saath AUV mein kaafi maze kiye, R6 ka maqbool, chennai mein kya hi din guzre the lol
Wing bulla sessions would have not been the same without you
Galti kari jo teri baat na maani aur ecell choda, could have done a lot better with you guys.
Tere saath juice shops jana, ccd jana, swimming session in summers, badminton khelna humesha yaad hai aur rahega.
Teri music playlist epic hoti thi, kshmr, garrix, don diablo, LITTTT <3
tere saath mixture trade karke pethe pelna was the best trade
Also thank your for so much chakhna, hehe
Tu toh Agra ka hi hai, aate rehna hai udhar toh, milte rahenge
Cheers bhai, Aage bhi aise hi Chaapte rehna
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
Or Bhai?
OG Chaapu C-BOT, Mera Bhai.
One of the funniest guy I've ever met
Tere aur Saksham ke friendly fights kya epic hote the XD
Tere room par wing bulla, Hall 2 ke computer room mein mugna aur boomerangs banana, winter nights mein CCD trips, bhai kya din the woh<3
Tumhare saath kaafi baar gala tar kiya hai, aage bhi karte rahenge
Kaafi cheezen sikhayi hai tumne<3
Tum humesha saath rhe ho, aur pata hai ki aage bhi aise hi chalte rhenge XD
Reunion toh pakka hai hi apna, aakhir time capsule bhi toh retireve karne jana hai
Cheers bhai, aage bhi chaapte rehna
Yours,
Saccha chutiya XD
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
Vineet Bhaaai,
Full on kanpuriya, tere accent ne mujhe bhi influence kar diya tha.
Chaapu at its best.
Ek woh bhi time tha jab saath mein hall 5 mein padthe the, fir basketball.
Tum Somesh ke saath +1 karke aaye the but alag hi hai tumhari jagah ab.
TA201ki party se, Saath mein Antaragni ghumna, Techkriti mein tujhe Stage par chadhana aur final sem mein F-312 mein saath mein lighter phodna, Kaafi key moments hai tere saath.
Mere paas itna content hai tera ki onlyfans chalu kar sakta.
Maaf karde bhai Goa ki backchodi ke liye :P
You have been a big influence on me. Aise hi chaapte rehna.
Milte hai tumhare penthouse mein....
..aur Mandu kehna cho do bhai XD
author: Naman  Agrawal

text:
Yogi, the real Stand up guru, Gupta rice company ka malik and a regular at Chandini Bar.
Tumne toh kya hi pyaari vibe bana di thi last sem mein, wish thoda aur saath reh paate. Teri Delhi ki stories humesha yaad rhegi XD.
Twitter par gaanon ki thread mat rokna, wahi playlist hai meri,
Tu teacher banega, yeh toh tab hi pata chal gya tha jab omegle par ladkiyon se career plans poooch rha tha.
Ustad ji ke gaane ke alag maze hote the jab saath mein tere jaise samjhane wala koi hota tha.
Aise hi chaapte rho, aur connected rehna, aakhir safar toh abhi shuru hi hua hai.
author: Naman  Agrawal
